content.rendered:
[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1578075332829{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”first-row”][vc_column]

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
WELCOME TO AMERICAN GROUND SCREW

Our ingenious system is a better choice all around, minimizing the hassle, expense and impact of foundation work.

American Ground Screw was established in Des Moines, Iowa, by the founders of a family-owned global manufacturer of ground screw systems. With our national sales and distribution network, American Ground Screw brings those high-quality products to U.S. customers with manufacturer-direct pricing and excellent customer service.

American Ground Screw’s factory has been at the forefront of ground screw manufacturing since 2006. We are now one of the world’s largest producers of ground screws, serving demanding wholesale and retail customers across Europe and now North America. Our manufacturing facilities employ over 150 workers and cover 200,000 square feet of steel welding, coating, and packaging workshops. With a monthly production capacity of 95,000 cubic feet and close proximity to sea ports, we can assure customers prompt production and delivery of any order.

‍

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Meet the Team

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”12514″ add_caption=”yes”]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”12519″ add_caption=”yes”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”12526″ add_caption=”yes”]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”12776″ add_caption=”yes”]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”12912″ add_caption=”yes”]

Kyle Lindenbolt – Customer Service Representative

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”12942″ add_caption=”yes” css=””]

Chris Wheeler – Administrative Coordinator

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”12943″ add_caption=”yes” css=””]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”12944″ add_caption=”yes” css=””]

Fabian Li – Accountant

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”12531″ add_caption=”yes”]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”12533″ add_caption=”yes”]

Doug Gruber – Warehouse Manager

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”12835″ add_caption=”yes”]

Daryl Pace – Warehouse Associate

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”12915″ add_caption=”yes”]

Kat Ferber – Assistant Warehouse Manager

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”12921″ add_caption=”yes”]

Michael Cox – Warehouse Associate

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”12924″ add_caption=”yes”]

Luis Acosta – Warehouse Associate

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1578090766941{margin-right: 40px !important;margin-left: 40px !important;background-color: #f7f9fa !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Easy
Get to the finish line faster.

Ground screws save you time and effort. With state-of-the-art products and easy-to-use tools, you can install structural foundations in just a few minutes. Simply mark the location, drive the screw, and start building — with no digging, re-grading, removing soil, or waiting to pour concrete.

Cost-Effective
Reduce your cost of labor and materials.

Build strong with a fraction of the budget required for poured concrete footings. Anchoring and building projects can now be accomplished with fewer hands, fewer materials and less specialized labor. And because there are no demolition or recycling costs for removal, you save money on the back end as well.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Sustainable
Minimize waste and impact.

Concrete foundation work has a large environmental footprint: from wear and tear on the landscape to machinery emissions to the impact of demolition later. Our reusable and removable solution virtually eliminates environmental damage to meet your building needs and your sustainability goals.

Customized
Let us design a system to fit your project.

When you need a foundation outside the standard selection, talk to us. With our in-house design and manufacturing capabilities, we can deliver custom solutions at a very reasonable cost. Whether you need specialized attachments or screws for complicated surface types, we provide proactive guidance to make your project a success.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
COMPANY HISTORY

The story of our success

The Beginning

First production facilities established servicing Europe & Asia
2006

Global Expansion

Established in Des Moines, IA utilizing contract warehousing.
2016

Distribution

50,000 sq. ft. distribution center purchased in Des Moines, IA
2018

Record Sales

ICC testing complete, approval Jan 2020
Record sales in solar & construction markets
2019

Building Code Approval

First ground screw in the building code
Opens market for construction applications
2020

Texas Distribution Center acquired, EPD issued

Houston area distribution center expands AGS distribution. AGS becomes first ground screw foundation product with a Type II Environmental Product Description (EPD)
2023
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
